alert.note: Alert for Fulton; Knox (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 6:23PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Fulton and south central Knox Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 622 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bushnell, or 14 miles northeast of Macomb, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Avon, London Mills, Maquon, Marietta and Ellisville. This includes Interstate 74 near mile marker 60. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
